name: Lifeguard Training
description: The primary purpose of the lifeguard training program is to provide entry-level lifeguard skills and knowledge to prevent, recognize, and respond to emergencies and to provide care for sudden illnesses until advanced medical personnel arrives and takes over. This program includes a lifeguard training course with aquatics-specific first aid and cardio-pulmonary resuscitation (CPR) training. Note: Participants MUST pass the pre-test on the first day of class. The test consists of the following: 30
